ARTICLE I

DEFINITIONS

Section 1.01 Certain Defined Terms.

"Indebtedness" means all obligations for borrowed money.

"Permitted Indebtedness" means Indebtedness permitted under Section 7.01.

ARTICLE VII

NEGATIVE COVENANTS

Section 7.01 Limitation on Indebtedness.

(a) The Borrower shall not incur any Indebtedness except Permitted Indebtedness.

(b) The Borrower may incur ratio debt if the leverage ratio is satisfied.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement.
